@title `Ujap students` game full solidity nft contract
   @dev Full implementation of an ERC721, VRFConsumerBase, Ownable, Strings contracts
   
   Description:
   Project made for the presentation of a university thesis, based on the studies 
   and databases of the blockchain to create a game, made to be run on Kovan Test 
   Blockchain, Local Blockchain and Main Ethereum Blockchain.
   This contract (StudentsMain) contains all the elements for the admin of the NFT and the Token
   
   Author: https://github.com/simetb

@dev Buy the token for the game this increases the liquidity of the game
   and reduce the tokenPool, these token prices are worked on ether and emit
   an event with information
 - Requirements:
   You need to have the full price in ether in the transfer

@dev Sell the token for the game this decrease the liquidity of the game
   and increase the tokenPool, token prices are worked on ether and emit an
     event with information
 - Requirements:
   You need to have the full amount of token y your wallet

@dev Transfer the tokens from one account to another, this will reduce 
   the account of the sender and increase the account of the receiver
 - Requirements:
   You need to have the full amount of token y your wallet

@dev Get the value of the actual token pool

Attack(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Function that get the nft and attack the level    Requirements:  - The `levelNumber` cannot be a value below than 1 an upper than 10 - The stat of `_intelligenceLevel` from `Student` need to be greater than 0 - You need to be the student owner - Enough token to attack - Your NFT need to be rest - Your NFT It should not be in the marketplace

BurnNft(uint256).details: Burn the character, transfer to 0x0...address   and remove it from the arrays   {ERC721 - _beforeTokenTransfer}   Requirements: - You need to be the owner of the NFT - The nft cannot be in the marketplace   Warning:  - THIS WILL DELETE THE NFT

BurnTokens(uint256).details: Decreasse the token pool, this will increasse the price of token.

BuyMarket(uint256).details: Buy the nft from the market and transfer it to buyer wallet, change the nft market state   and delete it from the market array   Requirements: - U need to have the enough amount of token in your wallet

BuyToken(uint256,uint256).details: Buy the token for the game this increases the liquidity of the game   and reduce the tokenPool, these token prices are worked on ether and emit   an event with information - Requirements:   You need to have the full price in ether in the transfer

CreateNftStudent(uint256).details: Mint a nft and associate with the owner   get the `newId` from the number of total nft, take the random number and generate the stats   and save it   Requirements:    - You can only create a student nft if you have the full price token in ur wallet

GetContractBalance().details: Get the contrac balance in eth

GetLiquidityPool().details: Get the value of the actual liquidity pool

GetNftPrice().details: Get the value nft price mint function

GetNumbersNft(address).details: Get the total Number of Nft from an account

GetOutMarket(uint256).details: This function will remove the NFT from the marketplace and update the market state   Requirements: - U need to have the enough amount of token in your wallet

GetOwner().details: get the owner of the contract

GetStudentIndexById(uint256).details: Get the student index by the id

GetStudentsByOwner(address).details: see all the INDEX NFT of the owner    Requirements: - the owner address cannot be 0x0...

GetStudentsInMarket().details: see all the INDEX NFT of the owner    Requirements: - the owner address cannot be 0x0...

GetTokenPool().details: Get the value of the actual token pool

GetTokenURI(uint256).details: Get the URI from the NFT Tokem

GetTotalNftInGame().details: Get the total Number of Nft in game

GetTotalNftInMarket().details: Get the total Number of Nft in market

GetTransferPrice().details: Get the `_transferPrice` global variable   Requirements:  - only the owner cant  do it

MintTokens(uint256).details: Increasse the token pool, this will decreasse the price of token.

NftToOwner(uint256).details: get the owner of the nft

PutInMarket(uint256,uint256).details: Put the student in a market this gonna change the market    state of the nft struct to true, cant be transferible , playable   Requirements: - U need to be the owner of the NFT

SeeWin(uint256).details: function to see if the nft win the attack

SellToken(uint256,uint256).details: Sell the token for the game this decrease the liquidity of the game   and increase the tokenPool, token prices are worked on ether and emit an     event with information - Requirements:   You need to have the full amount of token y your wallet

SetAttackPriceMultiplicator(uint256).details: Set the new `AttackMultiplicator`   Requirement:    - Only the contract owner can set a `AttackMultiplicator`

SetCoolDownTime(uint32).details: Change the CoolDownTime value      Requirements: - Only the owner can set a new `_coolDownTime`

SetNftPrice(uint256).details: Set the new `NftPrice`   Requirement:    - Only the contract owner can set a `NftPrice`

SetRewardMultiplicator(uint256).details: Set the new `RewardMultiplicator`   Requirement:    - Only the contract owner can set a `RewardMultiplicator`

SetTokenERC20Address(address).details: Set the token address of the contract   Requirements:    - Just the owner of the contract can doit

SetTokenURI(uint256,string).details: Get the URI from the NFT Tokem   Requirements:

SetTransferPrice(uint256).details: set a new `_transferPrice` variable price    Requirements:  - only the owner cant  do it

SetWearMultiplicator(uint256).details: Set the new `WearMultiplicator`   Requirement:    - Only the contract owner can set a `WearMultiplicator`

TransferLiquidity().details: Increasse the liquidity of ther contract

TransferNft(address,address,uint256).details: Transfer the character from a wallet to another wallet...   {ERC721 - _transfer()}    Requirements: - You need to be the owner of the NFT - The nft cannot be in the marketplace

TransferToken(address,uint256).details: Transfer the tokens from one account to another, this will reduce    the account of the sender and increase the account of the receiver - Requirements:   You need to have the full amount of token y your wallet

Withdraw(uint256,address).details: Decreasse the liquidity of ther contract

baseURI().details: Returns the base URI set via {_setBaseURI}. This will be automatically added as a prefix in {tokenURI} to each token's URI, or to the token ID if no specific URI is set for that token ID.

constructor.details: This constructor start the values of StundentsNft and the dependencies      Warnings: Default Kovan networks, see the default values in docs on into Studentsnft.sol

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: See {IERC165-supportsInterface}. Time complexity O(1), guaranteed to always use less than 30 000 gas.
